formalpara.title: Description
formalpara.para: When the input to the compiler is not a vector, then the shapes do not match up in the input verification of the Fix function and a LENGTH ERROR occurs.

formalpara.title: Analysis
formalpara.para: In the following code line that triggers this error:

listitem.para: The shape of the conditional depends on the shape of the ⍵ value, which shouldn't be the case. Instead, this needs to be a scalar or 1 element vector independent of ⍵ .
